== Ubuntu Payment Service ==

The Ubuntu payment service handles transactions for Ubuntu Software Center, Ubuntu One, the Canonical store, and other systems where people can purchase things from Canonical.  It is hosted at https://pay.ubuntu.com/ .  Development is hosted at https://launchpad.net/canonical-payment-service .

=== Purchase issues, refunds, and other payment FAQs ===

=== Contact ===

Support for purchases is available from pay-support@canonical.com.
